CustomField.description: Total_Contact_Hours__c can be used, because in CourseAPI we're displaying only final courses. Course can be final, only if all sessions except Reunion are confirmed.
CustomField.formula: "A " & TEXT(Total_Contact_Hours__c) & " hour course. This consists of " & TEXT(Count_of_Confirmed_Sessions__c) & " " & IF(Count_of_Confirmed_Sessions__c < 2, "session", "sessions") & "." & IF(Count_of_Unconfirmed_Reunion_Sessions__c > 0, BR() & "There's also a 2-hour reunion for all course participants with their new baby. Your course leader will agree a date, time and location for this with you.", "")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used for CourseAPI.
CustomField.label: Summary
